title: Zatoichi.1-25.Criterion.1962-1973.720p.BluRay.x264-SHiNTARO
description:
One Zatoichi torrent to rule them all?
Hopefully! Criterion finally released a huge boxset with 3 Movies on each disc. These are ripped off them.

English subtitles embedded in all, with japanese original audio.

Recommended player: MPC-HC (just google for "cccp codec") or VLC


You'll seed these when I'm done right?

Click my user name to find all my uploads!


This pack contains bluray rips of the following movies:

[01] Tale of Zatoichi
[02] Tale of Zatoichi Continues

[12] Zatoichi and the Chess Expert
[13] Zatoichi's Vengeance
[14] Zatoichi's Pilgrimage
